explains: n. 标点符号，标点符号用法；（点断性平衡说提出的）新物种迅速（或突然）的形成
wordGroup: punctuation mark n. 标点符号
punctuation character 标点字符；标点字元

sentences.en: Our teacher is very fussy about punctuation.
sentences.cn: 我们老师对标点符号十分挑剔。

sentences.en: He was known for his poor grammar and punctuation.
sentences.cn: 他以很差的语法和标点符号使用而出名。

sentences.en: Jessica had rapidly scanned the lines, none of which boasted a capital letter or any punctuation.
sentences.cn: 杰西卡已经迅速浏览了那几行，其中既无大写字母也无任何标点符号。
